text: A.C. Ancona was a football club which played in Italy. Since the summer 2010 the new main club of the city is the U.S. Ancona 1905 that play in Serie D. == Name == * 1905-1932 US Anconitana * 1932-1945 US Anconitana-Bianchi * 1945-1981 US Anconitana * 1981-2010 AC Ancona Category:Italian football clubs Category:Ancona Category:1905 establishments in Italy Category:2010 disestablishments in Europe Category:21st-century disestablishments in Italy Category:2010s in Italy
title: A.C. Ancona
